Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts,

My Vessels flight path disappeared ... was able to set once a flight maneuver, since then there is any flight path no more visible (in map view and tracking station) ... need help to get back the flight path display, im running out of oxygen and gummy bears.

Gemidiah Kerman

Hey Gemidiah,

Same happens to me. It was working again after deleting my campaign and starting a new one, but after some time it just happened again.
In the tracking station it shows "Trajectory Type: Landed", even though I am 200km above Kerbin...

Did you manage to find a solution to get it back to normal?

Zaphod_B

Edited February 25, 2023 by Zaphod_B
Added some infos,
